EN.title: General Industries
EN.subtitle: Bio-Gas
EN.content: We offer broad expertise and experience in gas processing. Our pumps, mixing, and separation technologies are applied in process gas scrubbing, gas drying, gas purification, gas fractionation, condensate stabilization, and gas-liquid separation. We also offer services for rotating equipment.
